name: Condo in Porto Â· â˜…4.78 Â· 2 bedrooms Â· 2 beds Â· 2 baths
description:
License nÂº 26435/AL

NOTICE: Major works in the city centre affecting access to building & causing noise

A beautiful apartment in the heart of the city. The house is divided over two floors with plenty of space. The views from the living room are stunning, where you will feel right in the centre of Porto with privileged views to PraÃ§a dos Aliados. The big kitchen has all you need to cook a great meal and the private interior garden offers a moment of peace. There is no lift, only stair access.

The space
NOTICE - Porto city centre is going through some major renovations for the construction of a new metro line. Please be aware of the noise and of the detours you have to make when getting to the house as some roads are blocked off to traffic and some to pedestrians too.

This unique and spacious penthouse apartment has been lovingly restored and modernised and is now available for short stays and city breaks in a stunning location ri
neighborhood_overview: Cafe's, bars, restaurants, ATM's and small supermarkets are all within a two minute walk and there is even a lovely cafe downstairs on the ground floor of the building filling the stairwell with the delicious but dangerous smell of freshly baked cakes and pastries every morning! You've been warned! Food and cooking is one of my passions and I'll be delighted to recommend some fantastic places to eat in Porto whatever your budget or dietary requirements. For those who like to stay up late and experience Porto's thriving nightlife, the main bar and club area is conveniently located close, but not too close to the building making getting home after an evening of music and dancing easy and hassle free. Over the last few years Porto's social, cultural and culinary sides have gone through something of a renaissance and it seems like a new bar, club or restaurant opens up in the city centre almost every weekend! For this reason I'll save my own personal recommendations on where to eat, drink
host_about: Hello there! Thank you for stopping by :) I'm Martha and Porto is my hometown. I've travelled and lived in many different cities, but Porto is the only one I call home. I studied arts and film and recently become a mum. I love Portuguese cooking and cycling, you're welcome to ask for advice where to go and what to eat. Really hope to meet you soon and welcome you to my favourite city in the world.

neighborhood_overview:
Try and go for a jog by the river Douro margin simply by heading right as you exit the building.

Inquire about adapters for US and UK appliances.


Close proximity of key historic sights in Porto will enable you to discover the city on foot- Clerigos tower 4min; Galerias de Paris 5min; Aliados Av- 7 min; Theater district 8-10 min, Ribeira -10 min, Gaia and the Porto wine caves crossing the bridge a leisurely 15-20 min walk. The pedestrian shopping district of Santa Catarina is less than 15 min away on foot, and the art district around Miguel Bombarda streets are 7-10 min away. Try to vist the nearby Foz, at the mouth of the Douro for a relaxing afternoon overlooking the sea. A bit further ahead sample fresh and delicious seafood in the picturesque village of Matosinhos.

name: Rental unit in Porto Â· â˜…4.82 Â· 2 bedrooms Â· 2 beds Â· 1 bath
description:
Right in the heart of the city with great access and in an area with all kinds of restaurants and services, Old Fabulous World keeps all the original Portuguese design in a protected building over 200 years old, where the Portuguese writer Joaquim Antunes LeitÃ£o was born in 1875. This apartment has been decorated in a very personal and welcoming way, and is also a second family residence.

The space
Old Fabulous World is an apartment with a maximum capacity for 4 people, with two bedrooms with a double bed. The apartment has a complete bathroom divided in separated rooms: one with shower, one with toilet, a living / dining room with a kitchenette equipped with a stove and oven.
We have an iron and ironing board at your disposal inside your apartment. Bed linen, towels and shampoo are included in the stay.
We can provide a bed, bath and baby chair if requested.
Air conditioning system that also provides heating of the apartment in winter, as well as
neighborhood_overview: Old Fabulous World is located right in the historic center of Porto. Here you can visit some of the most important tourist spots in the city, such as the Torre dos ClÃ©rigos de Nasoni, the tiles of the Igreja do Carmo and the Livraria Lello, known for its connection to JK Rowling and its literary works Harry Potter. There is an intimate connection with the academic tradition of the city in this area of the garden and the PraÃ§a dos LeÃµes, and it is even possible to attend different rituals and concentrations of students in their typical costumes or visit the rectory of the University of Porto. The area is also known for the numerous restaurants, bars and night clubs that give this city neighborhood a unique energy.
host_about:
Teresa and I have lived and travelled in many countries so we know how important it is to feel welcomed when arriving in a new place.  Teresa grew up in Tras-os-Montes in the north of Portugal and I am originally from San Francisco in the U.S.   Our professional backgrounds are in the field of education. Teresa owned and operated her own Montessori pre-school in Porto for 20 years and I taught at the local Universidade  Catolica Portuguesa. We lived in Asia for 5 years where Teresa learned the art of Chinese brush painting. You will see her paintings and other Asian touches in the decoration of our apartment..  I love taking my bicycle for a ride along the river or down the coast, stopping to eat freshly grilled fish at a local restaurant. I also like playing golf on the local courses around the Porto area.  And a great habit I picked up in Asia is the art of tea drinking â€“ I love the ceremony around tea and canâ€™t go a day without my Puer or Oolongs.  Teresa loves to paint and read in her spare time and has studied color therapy. _x000D_
We enjoy hosting and meeting people from all over the world.  So come and share a glass of Port wine with us and spend some time in our fantastic city!_x000D_
